Chuck

Contains logic to manage the machine chuck.

Functions
IsChuckClamped
call Chuck.IsChuckClamped(
&result
);

Test to see if the chuck is currently clamped

Response Parameters
&result

if the chuck is clamped, 1.  Otherwise, 0.

Clamp
call Chuck.Clamp();

Command the chuck to clamp

Unclamp
call Chuck.Unclamp();

Command the chuck to unclamp

VacuumOn
call Chuck.VacuumOn();

Command the chuck vacuum to turn on

VacuumOff
call Chuck.VacuumOff();

Command the chuck vacuum to turn off

BlowerOn
call Chuck.BlowerOn();

Command the chuck blower to turn on

BlowerOff
call Chuck.BlowerOff();

Command the chuck blower to turn off
